Organics/ Megatron Revived:
 
"What questions?  We have to get Malice back as soon as we can!" Organics snapped, but soon apologized.
 
"Rodimus Prime?  I do not believe I have had the pleasure of meeting him.  I wonde how Hot Rod has been doing." Megatron Revived said with a grin.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
YDrassil:::

"And �Rodimus Prime will have quiestion that have to be answered..." 
said Ydrassil

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Megatron Revived/ Organics:
>  
> "How was he when he was taken?  Was he functioning?  Was he 
fighting?" the clone asked in earnest.
> "Yes, he fought and nearly destroyed three of them, but I was 
captured, and they took him." Organics said, walking up to her step 
brother and esting her head on his broad chest.
> "Do hate for losing him?"
> The Emperor brought his right hand up and comforted the smaller 
bot.
> "I have changed so since our last meeting.  No, I do not.  We will 
retrieve him, but we must rest, all are weary right now."
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Ydrassil:
> 
> Ydrassil looked them, without say nothing
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Megatron Revived/ Organics:
> >  
> > "I most certainly am not joking.  I nearly crashed into him when 
I 
> arrived.  Besides, I have a score to settle with him.  He is here 
to 
> do what he attempted years ago: destroy the Autobot Matrix."
> >  
> > Organics stepped forward as her step brother brought the pilot 
> with him.
> > "And Unicron has his minions in full force.  They managed to 
take 
> our brother, a most powerful bounty hunter.  They took him with 
> them, up there," she said, a little sad and point up, to Unicron.
> > "WHAT?!?" the clone roared, clinching his fists.  
> > Organics rushed to calm the Emperor clone, to some avail.
> 
>
